statements: SELECT * FROM SupplyChainData;
SELECT product_name, producer, location FROM SupplyChainData WHERE supplier='Supplier A';
SELECT id, product_name, producer, timestamp FROM SupplyChainData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT supplier FROM SupplyChainData;
SELECT * FROM SupplyChainData WHERE location='Location A' AND producer='Producer X';
SELECT * FROM SupplyChainData WHERE location='Factory' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, producer, timestamp FROM SupplyChainData WHERE supplier='Supplier1' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT product_name, producer, location FROM SupplyChainData WHERE supplier='Supplier2' AND producer='Producer1';
SELECT id, product_name, supplier FROM SupplyChainData WHERE location='Retail Store' ORDER BY supplier ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, supplier, location FROM SupplyChainData WHERE producer='Producer2' AND location='Warehouse';
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_data;
SELECT product_name, supplier_name FROM supply_chain_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM movement_tracking ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location, action FROM movement_tracking WHERE product_id = 5;
SELECT id, product_name, supplier_name, timestamp FROM supply_chain_data WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Company';
SELECT id, product_name, supplier_name, timestamp FROM supply_chain_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, supplier_name, timestamp FROM supply_chain_data WHERE supplier_name = 'Supplier A';
SELECT id, product_id, location, action, timestamp FROM movement_tracking WHERE location = 'Warehouse A' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT product_name, supplier_name, timestamp FROM supply_chain_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND product_name LIKE '%Product%';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, from_address, to_address FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, quantity, manufacture_date FROM product_inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse A';
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_history WHERE operation_type = 'RECEIVE' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT product_name, transaction_hash FROM product_inventory JOIN blockchain_transactions ON product_inventory.product_id = blockchain_transactions.transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, from_address, to_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE from_address = '0x123' AND to_address = '0x456';
SELECT product_name, quantity, manufacture_date, expiry_date, location FROM product_inventory ORDER BY expiry_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_history WHERE operation_type = 'INBOUND' AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT timestamp, operation_type FROM supply_chain_history WHERE product_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Product
SELECT product_name, price FROM Product WHERE quantity > 0
SELECT manufacturer_id, COUNT(*) FROM Product GROUP BY manufacturer_id
SELECT * FROM Shipment ORDER BY shipment_date DESC
SELECT manufacturer_name, country FROM Manufacturer
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT product_name, price, quantity FROM Product ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT manufacturer_name, country FROM Manufacturer WHERE country='USA';
SELECT p.product_name, m.manufacturer_name FROM Product p JOIN Manufacturer m ON p.manufacturer_id = m.manufacturer_id;

SELECT s.shipment_id, p.product_name, src.location_name AS source_location, dest.location_name AS destination_location FROM Shipment s JOIN Product p ON s.product_id = p.product_id JOIN Location src ON s.source_location_id = src.location_id JOIN Location dest ON s.destination_location_id = dest.location_id ORDER BY s.shipment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_data LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, product_name, timestamp FROM supply_chain_data WHERE product_name = 'Product A';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT supplier, COUNT(*) as total_products FROM supply_chain_data GROUP BY supplier HAVING total_products > 10;
SELECT location_name, address, country FROM supply_chain_locations ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, batch_number, supplier FROM product_provenance WHERE producer = 'ABC Company' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-06-30 23:59:59';
SELECT id, product_name, supplier, timestamp FROM supply_chain_data WHERE supplier LIKE 'Sup%';
SELECT DISTINCT location_name, country FROM supply_chain_locations ORDER BY location_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT tx_id, amount, from_address, to_address, timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 3;
